name: Nyanroo The Supercat (itch)
description:
Story

A long time ago, the world was consumed by evil. to put an end to that, the gods themselves created a living magic cloth designed to give power to the one who wears it, the cloth searched for a warrior with a good heart and with him they banished evil and with time the legends gave birth to what we call today as super heroes! But the story starts when a super villain and his pet dog are about to defeat the current hero.


Seeing his imminent defeat the hero decides to sacrifice himself in order to defeat the villain.


The dog survives and the livin cloth chooses the cat as the new hero!


Now you start the journey while the evil dog Barkrow gather the help of the most powerful dogs in the world to defeat Nyanroo and conquer the world!


#retro #platformer #cats #genesis #megadrive #gamemakerstudio #adventure #action
